name: 🌟💎DOOGIEMOEWSER💎🌟
bio: Aloha! I'm 🌟💎DOOGIEMOEWSER💎🌟. I want to live in a world where people believe that one day cats will rule this planet. When my owner isn't watching, I steal their snap-backs and use them for litter paper. I'm not sorry. We can be friends, but keep the ultra purrsonal stuff to yourself, please.
